item.title: 3DMark 1.2.42.0、ニュース 3.0.1.321
item.description: 3DMark 1.1.11.4749 → 1.2.42.0 In the latest release, you can compare your score with Windows 8 tablets in the Device Channel. People rely on Futuremark benchmarks to produce accurate and unbiased results. Devices with suspicious benchmarks scores have been delisted from the Device Channel. You should not use scores from delisted devices to compare devices. 変更点はよくわからなかったが―
